name: McDonald Trumpo

responses.Big Footprint: Yes those shoes might fit me
responses.Small Footprint: No, my feet are bigger than that. Hey you know where they have small feet? China
responses.Glasses: Now I know you want proof of my medical records, but I assure you; I assure you, I have perfect vision - 20:20; I can see further than anyone else
responses.Bag: Well I get my bodyguards to carry everything, so no.
responses.Lipstick: My wife has a lot of lipstick - at home we have 3 draws of it. Now I hear you saying 'isn't 2 draws a lot? well my wife likes wearing lipstick so if she wants 4 draws she gets that many. Oh no I dont wear lipstick.
responses.Dark Hair: No, my hair is styled by the best hair stylists, I would never have dark hair - you know who has dark hair?...

noneResponses: gonna build a wall...,and get them to pay for it
